text: Blood Songs is a 2004 album from UK singer-songwriter Nick Harper. ==Track listing== # "Foreplay" # "Love Junky" # "Lily's Song" # "Love Is Music" # "Imaginary Friend" # "Stronger" # "Vampire Song" # "The Wanderer and His Shadow" # "The Kissing Gate" # "Boy Meets Planet" # "My Little Masterpiece" # "Blood Song" ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Nick Harper albums
title: Blood Songs
